entity.name: MergedItems
entity.query: SELECT i.ItemId AS ItemId, s.StoryId AS StoryId, DATE_FORMAT(i.DateStart, '%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00Z') AS StartDate, DATE_FORMAT(i.DateEnd, '%Y-%m-%dT23:59:59Z') AS EndDate, s.ProjectId AS ProjectId, s.`dc:title` AS StoryTitle, DATE_FORMAT(i.Timestamp, '%Y-%m-%dT%TZ') AS Timestamp, i.Title AS Title, i.Description AS Description, i.ImageLink AS PreviewImageLink, transcriptionView.TranscriptionText AS TranscriptionText, transcriptionView.Languages AS Languages, htrTranscriptionView.TranscriptionText AS HtrTranscriptionText, htrTranscriptionView.Languages AS HtrLanguages, categoriesView.Categories AS Categories, keywordsView.Keywords AS Keywords, placesView.PlaceNames AS PlaceNames, placesView.WikidataPlaceNames AS WikidataPlaceNames, placesView.WikidataIds AS PlaceWikidataIds, placesView.Coordinates AS PlaceCoordinates, personsView.Person AS Persons, coStatus.Name AS CompletionStatusName, coStatus.ColorCode AS CompletionStatusColorCode, coStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS CompletionColorGradient, trStatus.Name AS TranscriptionStatusName, trStatus.ColorCode AS TranscriptionColorCode, trStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS TranscriptionColorCodeGradient, deStatus.Name AS DescriptionStatusName, deStatus.ColorCode AS DescriptionColorCode, deStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS DescriptionColorGradient, locStatus.Name AS LocationStatusName, locStatus.ColorCode AS LocationColorCode, locStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS LocationColorCodeGradient, taStatus.Name AS TaggingStatusName, taStatus.ColorCode AS TaggingColorCode, taStatus.ColorCodeGRadient AS TaggingColorCodeGradient FROM Item i JOIN Story s ON s.StoryId = i.StoryId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Category) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Categories FROM item_category_view GROUP BY ItemId ) categoriesView ON categoriesView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Keyword) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Keywords FROM item_keyword_view GROUP BY ItemId ) keywordsView ON keywordsView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (PlaceName) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS PlaceNames, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (WikidataPlaceName) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS WikidataPlaceNames, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (TRIM(WikidataId)) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS WikidataIds, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (CONCAT(Latitude, ',', Longitude)) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Coordinates FROM item_place_view GROUP BY ItemId ) placesView ON placesView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(IFNULL(FirstName, ''), ' ', IFNULL(LastName, '')) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Person FROM item_person_view GROUP BY ItemId ) personsView ON personsView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, ANY_VALUE(TextNoTags) AS TranscriptionText, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Language) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Languages FROM item_transcription_view WHERE CurrentVersion = 1 GROUP BY ItemId ) transcriptionView ON transcriptionView.ItemId = i.ItemId AND i.TranscriptionSource != 'htr' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, ANY_VALUE(TranscriptionText) AS TranscriptionText, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Language) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Languages FROM item_htr_transcription_view GROUP BY ItemId ) htrTranscriptionView ON htrTranscriptionView.ItemId = i.Item.Id AND i.TranscriptionSource != 'manual' LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus coStatus ON i.CompletionStatusId = coStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus trStatus ON i.TranscriptionStatusId = trStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus deStatus ON i.DescriptionStatusId = deStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus locStatus ON i.LocationStatusId = locStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus taStatus ON i.TaggingStatusId = taStatus.CompletionStatusId;
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT i.ItemId AS ItemId, DATE_FORMAT(i.DateStart, '%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00Z') AS StartDate, DATE_FORMAT(i.DateEnd, '%Y-%m-%dT23:59:59Z') AS EndDate, s.StoryId AS StoryId, s.ProjectId AS ProjectId, s.`dc:title` AS StoryTitle, s.`edm:dataProvider` AS Institution, s.`edm:country` AS Country, d.Name AS Dataset, DATE_FORMAT(i.Timestamp, '%Y-%m-%dT%TZ') AS Timestamp, i.Title AS Title, 'Item' AS Type, i.Description AS Description, i.ImageLink AS PreviewImageLink, i.TranscriptionSource as TranscriptionSource, transcriptionView.Languages AS Languages, htrTranscriptionView.Languages AS HtrLanguages, categoriesView.Categories AS Categories, keywordsView.Keywords AS Keywords, placesView.PlaceNames AS PlaceNames, placesView.WikidataPlaceNames AS WikidataPlaceNames, placesView.WikidataIds AS PlaceWikidataIds, placesView.Coordinates AS PlaceCoordinates, personsView.Person AS Persons, coStatus.Name AS CompletionStatusName, coStatus.ColorCode AS CompletionStatusColorCode, coStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS CompletionColorCodeGradient, trStatus.Name AS TranscriptionStatusName, trStatus.ColorCode AS TranscriptionColorCode, trStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS TranscriptionColorCodeGradient, deStatus.Name AS DescriptionStatusName, deStatus.ColorCode AS DescriptionColorCode, deStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS DescriptionColorCodeGradient, locStatus.Name AS LocationStatusName, locStatus.ColorCode AS LocationColorCode, locStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS LocationColorCodeGradient, taStatus.Name AS TaggingStatusName, taStatus.ColorCode AS TaggingColorCode, taStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS TaggingColorCodeGradient FROM Item i JOIN Story s ON s.StoryId = i.StoryId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Category) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Categories FROM item_category_view WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' GROUP BY ItemId ) categoriesView ON categoriesView.itemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Keyword) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Keywords FROM item_keyword_view WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' GROUP BY ItemId ) keywordsView ON keywordsView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (PlaceName) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS PlaceNames, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (WikidataPlaceName) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS WikidataPlaceNames, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (TRIM(WikidataId)) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS WikidataIds, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (CONCAT(Latitude, ',', Longitude)) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Coordinates FROM item_place_view WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' GROUP BY ItemId ) placesView ON placesView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(IFNULL(FirstName, ''), ' ', IFNULL(LastName, '')) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Person FROM item_person_view WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' GROUP BY ItemId ) personsView ON personsView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, ANY_VALUE(TextNoTags) AS TranscriptionText, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Language) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Languages FROM item_transcription_view WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' AND CurrentVersion = 1 GROUP BY ItemId ) transcriptionView ON transcriptionView.ItemId = i.ItemId AND i.TranscriptionSource != 'htr' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, ANY_VALUE(TranscriptionText) AS TranscriptionText, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Language) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Languages FROM item_htr_transcription_view WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' GROUP BY ItemId ) htrTranscriptionView ON htrTranscriptionView.ItemId = i.ItemId AND i.TranscriptionSource != 'manual' LEFT JOIN Dataset d ON s.DatasetId = d.DatasetId AND s.StoryId = i.StoryId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus coStatus ON i.CompletionStatusId = coStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus trStatus ON i.TranscriptionStatusId = trStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus deStatus ON i.DescriptionStatusId = deStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus locStatus ON i.LocationStatusId = locStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus taStatus ON i.TaggingStatusId = taStatus.CompletionStatusId WHERE i.ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}';
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT ItemId FROM Item WHERE LastUpdated > '${dih.last_index_time}'

entity.name: MergedStories
entity.query: SELECT StoryId FROM Story WHERE StoryId = 152023
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT s.StoryId AS StoryId, s.Projectid AS ProjectId, d.Name AS Dataset, s.`edm:country` AS edmCountry, s.`edm:provider` AS edmProvider, l.NameEnglish AS edmLanguage, s.`dc:language` AS dcLanguage, CASE WHEN s.HasHtr = 1 THEN 'htr' WHEN s.HasHtr = 0 THEN 'manual' END AS TranscriptionSource, c.Name AS CompletionStatus, s.`dc:title` AS dcTitle, 'Story' AS Type, s.`dc:description` AS dcDescription, s.PlaceName as PlaceName, CONCAT(s.PlaceLatitude, ',', s.PlaceLongitude) AS Coordinates, s.`edm:dataProvider` AS Institution, img.ImageLink AS PreviewImageLink, categories.Value AS Categories, notStarted.NotStartedAmount AS NotStartedAmount, edit.EditAmount AS EditAmount, review.ReviewAmount AS ReviewAmount, completed.CompletedAmount AS CompletedAmount FROM Story s LEFT JOIN Language l ON s.`edm:Language` = l.Code LEFT JOIN Dataset d ON s.DatasetId = d.DatasetId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus c ON s.CompletionStatusId = c.CompletionStatusId JOIN story_first_item_view img ON img.StoryId = s.StoryId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i.StoryId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(p.Value) SEPARATOR '#~#') as Value FROM Property p JOIN PropertyType pt ON p.PropertyTypeId = pt.PropertyTypeId JOIN ItemProperty ip ON ip.PropertyId = p.PropertyId JOIN Item i ON i.ItemId = ip.ItemId WHERE i.StoryId = '${dih.delta.StoryId}' AND pt.Name = 'Category' GROUP BY StoryId ) categories ON s.StoryId = categories.StoryId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i.StoryId, count(*) AS NotStartedAmount FROM Item i JOIN CompletionStatus c ON c.CompletionStatusId = i.CompletionStatusId WHERE i.StoryId = '${dih.delta.StoryId}' AND c.Name = 'Not Started' GROUP BY StoryId ) notStarted ON notStarted.StoryId = s.StoryId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i.StoryId, count(*) AS EditAmount FROM Item i JOIN CompletionStatus c ON c.CompletionStatusId = i.CompletionStatusId WHERE i.StoryId = '${dih.delta.StoryId}' AND c.Name = 'Edit' GROUP BY StoryId ) edit ON edit.StoryId = s.StoryId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i.StoryId, count(*) AS ReviewAmount FROM Item i JOIN CompletionStatus c ON c.CompletionStatusId = i.CompletionStatusId WHERE i.StoryId = '${dih.delta.StoryId}' AND c.Name = 'Review' GROUP BY StoryId ) review ON review.StoryId = s.StoryId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i.StoryId, count(*) AS CompletedAmount FROM Item i JOIN CompletionStatus c ON c.CompletionStatusId = i.CompletionStatusId WHERE i.StoryId = '${dih.delta.StoryId}' AND c.Name = 'Completed' GROUP BY StoryId ) completed ON completed.StoryId = s.StoryId WHERE s.StoryId = '${dih.delta.StoryId}' ORDER BY s.StoryId DESC;
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT StoryId FROM Story WHERE LastUpdated > '${dih.delta.last_index_time}'

entity.name: MergedTranscriptions
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT 'Transcription' AS Type, i.ItemId AS ItemId, CONCAT(i.ItemId, s.StoryId) AS TranscriptionId, i.Title AS Title, s.StoryId AS StoryId, s.`dc:title` AS StoryTitle, s.`edm:dataProvider` AS Institution, s.`edm:country` AS Country, DATE_FORMAT(tr.Timestamp, '%Y-%m-%dT%TZ' ) AS Timestamp, i.ImageLink AS PreviewImageLink, i.TranscriptionSource AS TranscriptionSource, tr.TranscriptionText AS TranscriptionText, trLanguages.Languages AS Languages, categoriesView.Categories AS Categories, htrTrView.TranscriptionText AS HtrTranscriptionText, htrTrView.Languages AS HtrLanguages, trStatus.Name AS TranscriptionStatusName, trStatus.ColorCode AS TranscriptionColorCode, trStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS TranscriptionColorCodeGradient FROM Item i JOIN Story s ON s.StoryId = i.StoryId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, ANY_VALUE(TextNoTags) AS TranscriptionText, DATE_FORMAT(Timestamp, '%Y-%m-%dT%TZ') AS Timestamp FROM Transcription WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' AND CurrentVersion = 1 GROUP BY ItemId, Timestamp ) tr ON tr.ItemId = i.ItemId AND i.TranscriptionSource != 'htr' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Language) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Languages FROM item_transcription_view WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' GROUP BY ItemId ) trLanguages ON trLanguages.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Category) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Categories FROM item_category_view WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' GROUP BY ItemId ) categoriesView ON categoriesView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ItemId, ANY_VALUE(TranscriptionText) AS TranscriptionText, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Language) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Languages FROM item_htr_transcription_view WHERE ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}' GROUP BY ItemId ) htrTrView ON htrTrView.ItemId = i.ItemId AND i.TranscriptionSource != 'manual' LEFT JOIN Dataset d ON s.DatasetId = d.DatasetId AND s.StoryId = i.StoryId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus trStatus ON i.TranscriptionStatusId = trStatus.CompletionStatusId WHERE i.TranscriptionStatusId != 1 AND i.ItemId = '${dih.delta.ItemId}';
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT ItemId FROM Item WHERE LastUpdated > '${dih.last_index_time}'
